channel.title: rsync on Rafael Leyva Ruiz
channel.description: Recent content in rsync on Rafael Leyva Ruiz

item.title: 10 - Creating an incremental copy of iphone photos with rsync
item.description: rsync is a great tool to manage backups, create incremental copies of entire directories. etc. I remember the first time that Victor Terron talked about it in his talk to the students of the first course of computer science degree in the UGR. On the other side cloud storage services are expensive.
